document.full_text: the hedge fund mogul, who met reporters during batting practice monday, said he hoped the deal being negotiating for him to purchase a stake in the mets would be completed by the end of june.
document.title: einhorn says deal with mets is a 'win-win'
lines_and_colors: the hedge fund mogul, who met reporters during batting practice monday, said he hoped the deal being negotiating for him to purchase a stake in the mets would be completed by the end of june.
